info.title: Time Stamp

time.stamp.description: This Resource describes Properties associated with a timestamp. The "timestamp" Property is a string that captures a timestamp using the RFC3339 datetime format (e. g: 2007-04-05T14:30Z) (Time+Date+Timezone).

timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formated time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00).
